title: Bip Bop
lyrics:
Bip bop, bip bip bop 
Bip bop, bip bip band 
Dig your bottom dollar 
Put it in your hand 


Try to hang out 

Underneath the stand 



Put your hands together 

Gonna see a band 



Treat me like a good boy 

Treat me like a man 



Take me hair and curlers 

But treat me like a man
